markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Galvanic Chew](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1918)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Lozenge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=484" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 48 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A galvanic chew is a processed ball of dried [electric eel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=174), roasted until chewy and coated in spicy, reagent-infused powder that tingles with electricity as you chew. For up to 1 hour, you have resistance 5 to electricity.

 **Secondary Effect** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56)) **Trigger** You're hit by a melee attack or touched by a creature; **Effect** You channel electricity into the triggering creature, which must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (or stunned 2 on a critical failure). The chew becomes inert. You're then temporarily immune to galvanic chews for 24 hours or until the next time you make your daily preparations.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Galvanic Chew

text: <title level="1" right="Item 8" pfs="Standard" > Galvanic Chew Source Treasure Vault pg. 48 1.1 Price 75 gp Usage held in 1 hand Activate Single Action Interact --- A galvanic chew is a processed ball of dried electric eel, roasted until chewy and coated in spicy, reagent-infused powder that tingles with electricity as you chew. For up to 1 hour, you have resistance 5 to electricity. Secondary Effect Reaction (electricity) Trigger You're hit by a melee attack or touched by a creature; Effect You channel electricity into the triggering creature, which must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or be stunned 1 (or stunned 2 on a critical failure). The chew becomes inert. You're then temporarily immune to galvanic chews for 24 hours or until the next time you make your daily preparations.
